name: Human
description: Just a normal human. Remarkably average at everything, yet somehow convinced they should run the world.

name: Elf
description: Pointy-eared vegetarians who live way too long and never let you forget how much better things were in the 'old days'.

name: Dwarf
description: Short, loud, and smells faintly of damp stone and questionable ale. Do not touch their beard.

name: Halfling
description: Three feet of pure optimism and hunger. Mostly used as a projectile by the stronger party members.

name: Orc
description: Large, green, and generally considers 'reading' to be a decorative hobby for people without muscles.

name: Gnome
description: A concentrated ball of curiosity and bad ideas. Usually found vibrating with excitement or on fire.
